title: Pet Sematary Trailer Reacts - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 10.10.18
description:
Greg and Nick talk about the drama on the set of The Joker movie and watch the trailer for the upcoming Stephen King horror remake, Pet Sematary!

Test out Gabi for free at http://gabi.com/MORNING

Robinhood is giving listeners free stock to help build your portfolio. Sign up at http://morningshow.robinhood.com

Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/KFMS

-Joker Movie extras piss on train tracks when you gotta go... (27:30 mins)
-The Rock will play an american folk hero in his first netflix movie (32:10 mins)
-the deadpool before christmas will include 15 minutes of new footage and a new character (36:20 mins)
-Pet Sematary trailer (42:40 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
